name: Distant Space 2
description: Distant Space 2 - is an indirect continuation of the first part, in which you will find more dynamic gameplay. Your task is to destroy enemy ships on each level to go to the next of 26 available. In addition to conventional ships, you will have to wait for the boss ships, the battle with which will not be easy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1 GHz Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM
